# optionsByRecordZoneID

**Instance Property**

Configuration options for each record zone that the operation retrieves.

## Declaration

```swift
var optionsByRecordZoneID: [CKRecordZone.ID : CKFetchRecordZoneChangesOperation.ZoneOptions]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

You can associate each record zone ID with options that define what CloudKit fetches for that record zone.  See [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKFetchRecordZoneChangesOperation/ZoneOptions] for more information.
title: optionsByRecordZoneID
